languages.text: "Если бы они хоть немного желали познать мою натуру, то давно бежали бы в страхе от того, кто идет по Пути изгоя. Но они лишь пытаются меня спровоцировать. Задеть. Нет. Мон-кай движут подсознательные инстинкты — вам важно выживание, размножение, сохранение вида, истребление тех, кто представляет для вас опасность... Это не плохо и не хорошо. Так есть".

"Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."
languages.original_text: "Если бы они хоть немного желали познать мою натуру, то давно бежали бы в страхе от того, кто идет по Пути изгоя. Но они лишь пытаются меня спровоцировать. Задеть. Нет. Мон-кай движут подсознательные инстинкты — вам важно выживание, размножение, сохранение вида, истребление тех, кто представляет для вас опасность... Это не плохо и не хорошо. Так есть".

traits.locale_text: "If any of them would have ever wanted to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from the one who walks down the Path of an exile. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, their kind's preservation, the annihilation of those who pose a threat to them... It's neither good nor bad. It is what it is."

"If any of them would have ever wanted to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from the one who walks down the Path of an exile. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, their kind's preservation, the annihilation of those who pose a threat to them... It's neither good nor bad. It is what it is."

"Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

"Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

"Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

languages.text: “就算他们之中真的有人打算了解我的本性，也只会被踏上流浪者道途的人吓跑而已。他们只是想要挑衅我、伤害我。不，猴子只会依照他们的本能行动，他们生存、繁衍，确保种族存续，消灭一切威胁。我不会评判这是好是坏，但事实正是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

traits.locale_text: “就算他们之中真的有人打算了解我的本性，也只会被踏上流浪者道途的人吓跑而已。他们只是想要挑衅我、伤害我。不，猴子只会依照他们的本能行动，他们生存、繁衍，确保种族存续，消灭一切威胁。我不会评判这是好是坏，但事实正是如此。”

languages.text: «Si alguno de ellos hubiese querido realmente comprender mi naturaleza, habría huido espantado de alguien que recorre la Senda del Proscrito. Pero lo único que quieren es tratar de provocarme. Hacerme daño. No. Los mon-keigh se rigen por sus instintos: sobrevivir, procrear, perpetuar su especie y aniquilar a quienes les amenazan... No es algo bueno ni malo. Sencillamente es así».
languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguno de ellos hubiese querido realmente comprender mi naturaleza, habría huido espantado de alguien que recorre la Senda del Proscrito. Pero lo único que quieren es tratar de provocarme. Hacerme daño. No. Los mon-keigh se rigen por sus instintos: sobrevivir, procrear, perpetuar su especie y aniquilar a quienes les amenazan... No es algo bueno ni malo. Sencillamente es así».

languages.text: « S'ils avaient souhaité comprendre ma nature, ils se seraient déjà enfuis, terrifiés par celle qui arpente la Voie de l'Errance. Non, ils essaient simplement de me provoquer, de me blesser. Les mon-keigh n'écoutent que leur instinct, qui les pousse à survivre, à se reproduire, à assurer la préservation de leur espèce et l'annihilation de ceux qui la menacent... Ce n'est ni bon ni mauvais. C'est juste leur fonctionnement. »
languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

traits.locale_text: « S'ils avaient souhaité comprendre ma nature, ils se seraient déjà enfuis, terrifiés par celle qui arpente la Voie de l'Errance. Non, ils essaient simplement de me provoquer, de me blesser. Les mon-keigh n'écoutent que leur instinct, qui les pousse à survivre, à se reproduire, à assurer la préservation de leur espèce et l'annihilation de ceux qui la menacent... Ce n'est ni bon ni mauvais. C'est juste leur fonctionnement. »

languages.text: "Würde irgendeiner von ihnen meine Natur verstehen wollen, hätte er die Flucht ergriffen, aus Angst vor jemandem, der den Pfad des Ausgestoßenen beschritten hat. Aber sie versuchen immer nur, mich zu provozieren. Mir wehzutun. Nein. Chem-Pan-Sey werden von ihrem Instinkt getrieben – überleben, fortpflanzen, um die eigene Spezies zu erhalten, und alle vernichten, die sie bedrohen ... Das ist weder gut noch böse. Es ist einfach nur."
languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

traits.locale_text: "Würde irgendeiner von ihnen meine Natur verstehen wollen, hätte er die Flucht ergriffen, aus Angst vor jemandem, de den Pfad des Ausgestoßenen beschritten hat. Aber sie versuchen immer nur, mich zu provozieren. Mir wehzutun. Nein. Chem-Pan-Sey werden von ihrem Instinkt getrieben – überleben, fortpflanzen, um die eigene Spezies zu erhalten, und alle vernichten, die sie bedrohen ... Das ist weder gut noch böse. Es ist einfach nur."

languages.text: 「我の本性を理解しようとする者がいたならば、彼らはすでに『追放者の道』を歩む者を恐れて逃げ出していただろう。だが、彼らは我を挑発しようとしていただけだ。ただ傷つけようとしていた。いや、モン＝ケイは本能に突き動かされているのだ。生き残るために、繁殖するために、種の保存を確実にするために、そして自分たちを脅かす者たちを絶滅させるために…それは善でも悪でもない。ただそういうものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

traits.locale_text: 「我の本性を理解しようとする者がいたならば、彼らはすでに『追放者の道』を歩む者を恐れて逃げ出していただろう。だが、彼らは我を挑発しようとしていただけだ。ただ傷つけようとしていた。いや、モン＝ケイは本能に突き動かされているのだ。生き残るために、繁殖するために、種の保存を確実にするために、そして自分たちを脅かす者たちを絶滅させるために…それは善でも悪でもない。ただそういうものなのだ」

languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

languages.text: "Benim doğamı anlamak isteseler Yurtsuzun Yolu'nu yürüyenden korkuyla kaçarlardı. Sadece beni kışkırtmaya çalışıyorlar. Beni incitmeye çalışıyorlar. Hayır. Mon-keighler; hayatta kalma, çoğalma, türlerinin korunmasını sağlama ve onları tehdit edenleri yok etme içgüdüleriyle hareket ediyor. Bu, iyi veya kötü bir şey değil. Sadece gerçek."
languages.original_text: "Had any of them wished to understand my nature, they would have already run away in fear from one who walks the Path of the Outcast. But they are just trying to provoke me. Hurt me. No. Mon-keigh are driven by their instincts — to survive, to breed, to ensure the preservation of their species and the annihilation of those who threaten them... It is neither good nor bad. It simply is."

traits.locale_text: "Biri bile benim doğamı anlamak isteseydi, Yurtsuzun Yolu'nu yürüyenden korkuyla kaçardı. Sadece beni kışkırtmaya çalışıyorlar. Beni incitmeye çalışıyorlar. Hayır. Mon-keighler hayatta kalma, çoğalma, türlerinin korunmasını sağlama ve onları tehdit edenleri yok etme içgüdüleriyle hareket ediyor. Bu, iyi veya kötü bir şey değil. Sadece gerçek."
